entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
